name: Dr. Bob Brown
say: General dentists are essential oral health practitioners who diagnose and treat common dental issues. They perform routine cleanings, fillings, extractions, and educate patients on preventive care for optimal dental well-being.

name: Dr. Mary Smith
say: General dentists are essential oral health practitioners who diagnose and treat common dental issues. They perform routine cleanings, fillings, extractions, and educate patients on preventive care for optimal dental well-being.

name: Dr. Nick Dark
say: Orthodontists specialize in correcting misalignments and irregularities of the teeth and jaws. They use braces, aligners, and other devices to improve bite and enhance overall dental and facial aesthetics.
